name: Mahindra Bolero Neo Plus
description: The price of Mahindra Bolero Neo Plus, a 9 seater Compact SUV, ranges from Rs. 11.39  - 12.49 Lakh. It is available in 2 variants, with an engine of 2184 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Manual. Bolero Neo Plus comes with 2 airbags. Mahindra Bolero Neo Plus is available in 3 colours.

variants.variant_name: Bolero Neo Plus P4 2184 cc, Diesel, Manual, 118 bhp
Bolero Neo Plus P10 2184 cc, Diesel, Manual, 118 bhp
